# test-checkbox

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                     | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`        | `checked`         | The active checked state        | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `defaultChecked` | `default-checked` | The default checked state       | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`        | Disabled state of checkbox      | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`          | `label`           | Name of the field               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`           | `name`            | Label associated with the field | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`          | `value`           | underlying input value          | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                          | Type               |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `checkedChange` | Emits boolean value of checked state | `CustomEvent<any>` |
